description: This is an RFP for Web maintenance and admin services for the PSIC website. The service will include maintenance, upgrades, accessibility reviews and redesign work as needed.
full_summary:
================================
### Request for Proposal: Web Maintenance and Administration Services
#### Solicitation Number: P2400058
#### Tender Reference Number: CB-725-74492005
#### Closing Date: February 26, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
#### Expected Contract Start Date: April 1, 2024
#### Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2026

**Summary**
-----------

The Office of the Public Sector Integrity Commissioner of Canada (PSIC) is seeking a service provider to deliver web maintenance and administration services for its existing website. The successful vendor will be responsible for a range of tasks, including:

* Maintenance and upgrades of the existing website
* Accessibility reviews and redesign work as needed
* Operation of the website, including hosting and content management

**Key Requirements**

* Experience with website maintenance and administration
* Proficiency in content management systems (CMS), particularly Drupal
* Ability to provide regular updates and progress reports
* Compliance with the Government of Canada's accessibility standards
* Familiarity with trade agreements, including the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Procurement Details**

* Solicitation Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Evaluation Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contact Information**
--------------------

Kelsey Donaldson 
Kelsey.Donaldson@psic-ispc.gc.ca
(343) 576-3940

**Important Notes**
------------------

* The tender document is available in English and French.
* Tenders must be submitted in both official languages.
* The closing date for submissions is February 26, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST.

Please ensure that your tender submission complies with all requirements and guidelines outlined in this document. Failure to do so may result in disqualification. You must also adhere to the Government of Canada's policies and procedures for tendering. For more information, please contact Kelsey Donaldson at (343) 576-3940 or Kelsey.Donaldson@psic-ispc.gc.ca.  
====================================
